mainHero.title: Sanchez Septic Services
mainHero.subtitle: Your Trusted Partner for Reliable Septic Solutions.
mainHero.description: Sanchez Septic specializes in septic tank pump outs, septic tank repairs and service, inspections, and field line repair. We are an owner-operated business and have been in business for over 5 years.

items.title: Septic System Repairs
items.description: Whether it's for your home or business, our technicians will inspect your septic system thoroughly before any work begins. Once we detect the issue, we'll explain repair or upgrade options that fit your needs and budget.

items.title: Septic System Inspection
items.description: If you need your septic tank and system inspected or certified before buying or selling a home, we are here to help.

items.title: Septic Pumping
items.description: Septic pumping is one of the best things you can do for your entire septic system. Septic pumping is important and extends the life of your septic system by clearing out sludge, grime and solids that accumulate in your tank.

features.title: Latest & greatest
features.subtitle: All the best technologies out there!

items.name: Tailwind
items.description: Tailwind CSS is a highly customizable, low-level CSS framework for quickly creating beautiful designs without any annoying opinionated stylesheet nonsense.

items.name: Next.js
